title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 152.9 - Change of accounting period
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 152.9 - Change of accounting period

State Regulations

In the case of a short-period income tax return
resulting from a change of accounting period (see section 604 of the Tax Law), the general filing requirements stated in section
152.1
of this Part will likewise apply. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
152.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
